Na poti na poroko umorili tri matere in šest otrok
Prišlo je do kartelnega spopada.
05 Nov 2019, 19:37 by P. K.
LA MORA – Dawne Ray Langford (43), Christine Marie Langford (31) in Rhonito Marie LeBaron (33) so ubili v La Mori v mehiški zvezni državi Sonora, poleg njih pa še šest otrok (med njimi celo Rhonitina šestmesečna dvojčka). Vsi so bili ameriški državljani, člani mormonske skupnosti, in so se vračali s poroke.Med potjo so omenjeno deveterico napadli člani mamilarskega kartela in jim prerešetali osebna vozila, poroča The Sun. Eno je tudi zagorelo in ga je razneslo. O tem, kaj je bil razlog za tako grozovit zločin, ne poročajo.Koliko je človeško življenje vredno v Mehiki, sicer najzgovorneje priča podatek, da so denimo v letu 2018 uradno (po podatkih mehiškega notranjega ministrstva) sprožili kar 33.341 preiskav umorov zaradi narkokartelnih obračunov.
text:
On the way to marriage, three mothers and six children were murdered
There was a cartel.
05 Nov 2019, 19:37 by P.K.
LA MORA - Dawne Ray Langford, 43, Christine Marie Langford, 31, and Rhonito Marie LeBaron, 33, were killed in La Mora, Sonora, with six other children (including even Rhonita's six-month-old twin). They were all American citizens, members of the Mormon community, and were returning from their wedding. During the journey, the nine men were attacked by members of a drug cartel and crashed into their cars, The Sun reported. One also got burned and blew it. What is the reason for such a heinous crime is not reported.How much is human life worth in Mexico, the most telling evidence is that, for example, in 2018, 33,341 drug cartel homicide cases were officially opened (according to the Mexican Interior Ministry) .
